channel.title: Poems
channel.description:
[size=14pt]Shape of life[/size]
What is the shape of Life? The shape of LIfe is your view of life It is all you believe in and know No, it is not a circle nor a square In fact, it isn't even a real shape The shape of Life is different for everyone Every side of the shape representing something you believe in And every face representing all you know every shape shows you as a person and only you can fit into the shape so is there a shape of Life? of course the correct name for the shape is... you.
[size=14pt]Crazy[/size]
Am I Crazy? Of course not! I can't be! I look out the window to see the trees swaying. If only there were windows in this place I picture my family and how they loved me... Loved me? They never loved me Mother and father never loved me! I can't stop thinking about why I'm in here Or maybe I'm nowhere... So if I'm nowhere, yet still in a room then where am I? And why did they give me this jacket? I am not cold and still they give me a jacket. Maybe my outlook on the world is totally wrong What if my life is just a figment of my imagination? And all that I know if fake. The mysterious men in white suits are nice and give me pills to keep me healthy But it has become an addiction of some sort I need them, but I don't "need" them. I guess I can sleep now...or Am I already sleeping and is this all just a big dream? What if all I have to do is wake myself up. Well,I will save that for tomorrow's discussion But for now I will rest in my room of pillows and think How I am not... Crazy...
These are poems I created. If they are not good then go ahead and tell me :] Post your own poems your created or poems you like. :]

item.title: Poems
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

[quote=“casey., post:1, topic:366276”][quote author=casey. link=topic=418504.msg3075773#msg3075773 date=1261813962]
Mum mum moparscape
Mum mum moparscape

I wanna make a server like them other boys
Code em’ let em’ rep me raise it baby play with me (I love it)
Mod and Admin need before its to start
And after he’s been hooked I’ll make him pay for modddd

Oh, oh, oh, oh, ohhhh, ohh-oh-e-ohh-oh-oh
I’ll get him on, show him my custom spawn
Oh, oh, oh, oh, ohhhh, ohh-oh-e-ohh-oh-oh,
I’ll get him on, show him my custom spawn

Can’t play any
Can’t play any
No he can’t play any server
Moparscape(She’s got to love nobody)
Can’t play any
Can’t play any
No he can’t any server
Moparscape
(She’s got to love nobody)

M-m-m-oparscape, M-m-m-oparscape
(Mum mum moparscape)
M-m-m-oparscape, M-m-m-oparscape
(Mum mum mum mah)

I wanna play with him a hard pair we will be
A little moparscape is fun when you’re with me I love it
Moparscape is not the same without a the M
And baby when your banned it’s not fun

Can’t play any
Can’t play any
No he can’t play any server
(She’s got to love nobody)
Can’t play any
Can’t play any
No he can’t any server
(She’s got to love nobody)

M-m-m-oparscape, M-m-m-oparscape
(Mum mum moparscape)
M-m-m-oparscape, M-m-m-oparscape
(Mum mum mum mah)

I won’t tell you that I reported
Tell or Rep you
Cause I’m suckin to the mods
I’m not lying I’m just suckin’ with my report-glue-gunning
Just like a wales and cancer
Leave before we ban you
I promise this, promise this
Check the server status cause I’m marvelous

Can’t play any
Can’t play any
No he can’t play any server
(She’s got to love nobody)
Can’t play any
Can’t play any
No he can’t any server
(She’s got to love nobody)

M-m-m-oparscape, M-m-m-oparscape
(Mum mum moparscape)
M-m-m-oparscape, M-m-m-oparscape
(Mum mum mum mah)

[/quote][/quote]what do we rap this to the beat of?

EDIT - pokerface, right?

item.title: Poems
item.dc:creator: @Liquid_Magic Liquid Magic
item.description:
@Liquid_Magic wrote:

[quote=“ChaosPkers, post:19, topic:366245”][quote author=usman555 link=topic=462446.msg3383165#msg3383165 date=1288219360]

[quote author=ChaosPkers link=topic=462446.msg3383158#msg3383158 date=1288219151]
All alone just she and I.

Her hair was soft
Her eyes were blue
I knew just what she wanted to do.

Her skin so soft
Her legs so fine
I ran my fingers down her spine.

I didn’t know how
But I tried my best
I started by placing my hands on her breast.

I remember my fear my fast beating heart
But slowly she spread her legs apart
And when I did it I felt no shame.

All at once the white stuff came
At last it’s finished it’s all over now
[/quote]That seemed a bit… wrong…
[/quote]whats wrong with it? pervert[/quote]

It sounds like a dirty story. Almost the same concept though. BAHA :eek: :rolleyes: :o

Read full topic

item.title: Poems
item.dc:creator: @R_A_R_E_S R A R E S
item.description:
@R_A_R_E_S wrote:

[quote=“ChaosPkers, post:16, topic:366245”][size=20pt]My first time milking a cow[/size]
The sky was dark
The moon was high
All alone just she and I.

Her hair was soft
Her eyes were blue
I knew just what she wanted to do.

Her skin so soft
Her legs so fine
I ran my fingers down her spine.

I didn’t know how
But I tried my best
I started by placing my hands on her breast.

I remember my fear my fast beating heart
But slowly she spread her legs apart
And when I did it I felt no shame.

All at once the white stuff came
At last it’s finished it’s all over now
My first time ever at milking a cow…

That’s my personal favorite. I didn’t write it.[/quote]
hahahahahhaha fucking awesome hahaha

Read full topic

item.title: Poems
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

[size=20pt]My first time milking a cow[/size]
The sky was dark
The moon was high
All alone just she and I.

Her hair was soft
Her eyes were blue
I knew just what she wanted to do.

Her skin so soft
Her legs so fine
I ran my fingers down her spine.

I didn’t know how
But I tried my best
I started by placing my hands on her breast.

I remember my fear my fast beating heart
But slowly she spread her legs apart
And when I did it I felt no shame.

All at once the white stuff came
At last it’s finished it’s all over now
My first time ever at milking a cow…

That’s my personal favorite. I didn’t write it.
